subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Dreamtime: Aboriginal Australian Creation
description: A quick win: understand The Dreamtime: Aboriginal Australian Creation.

hook.text: The world wasn't created once. Ancestral spirits are still creating it. The Dreamtime is past, present, and future.

buildup.text: Aboriginal Australians believe ancestral beings shaped the land as they traveled. Each hill and river has a story.

discovery.text: The Dreamtime isn't history. It exists now. Every ritual reconnects the present to the eternal creative moment.

twist.text: This is Earth's oldest continuous religious tradition: 65,000 years. It predates every major world religion.

climax.text: Aboriginal creation collapses past and present. Time isn't a line but a circle. Creation never stopped.

punchline.text: 65,000 years old. Creation never stopped. The Dreamtime continues now.

quiz.question: What makes Aboriginal Australian Dreamtime unique?
options: It's ongoing and exists in past, present, and future
